title: Kenji Kawai Live Concert - Cinema Symphony (DVD) ~by Yokky~
description:
Here is the DVD of the only live Kenji Kawai's concert - 'Cinema Symphony (2007). 

________________________________________________________________________________

Kenji Kawai is known mostly for soundtracks for Mamoru Oshii's anime ('Ghost in the Shell', 'Avalon', 'Patlabor' etc). 

Here he performes his fantastic pieces from 'Ghost in the Shell', 'Mezame No Hakobune' (with that unique high-pitched choir), 'Avalon' (with stunning
soprano voice - Elzbieta Towarnicka!!!), 'Patlabor', 'Seven Swords', 'Running Wild', 'Ring' and the cool 'Death Note: Last Name'.

His female choir from 'Ghost in the Shell' is amazing!!! 
Elzbieta Towarnicka is amazing!!! 
Kenji Kawai is amazing!!!
Never heard a choir like that anywhere. :)


Here he and his orchestra perform such amazing pieces from such films and anime as:

________________________________________________________________________

~ Ghost in the Shell
~ Ghost in the Shell: Innocence 
~ Avalon
~ Death Note: Last Name 
~ Seven Swords 
~ Battle of Wits 
~ Running Wild 
~ Red Spectacles 
~ The Ring 
and 
~ Mezame No Hakobune a.k.a. 'Open Your Mind'.

________________________________________________________________________

EJOY LISTENING! =)
